ComicInfo.Series: Critical Role: Vox Machina Origins III
ComicInfo.Summary:
Something suspicious connects two mysteries. As Vox Machina continue their investigation, they stumble upon a job from someone unexpected: Vex and Vaxâ€™s father, Syldor. When he presents another opportunity to pursue information connected to Realmseer Eskil and Westruun, the team splits up to chase down two leads. But danger lies in wait as they attempt to track down a missing VIP in addition to the Clasp. "This remains one of the best fantasy comics on stands today." - Comicbook.com
